name: USA 2020
description: The year 2020 has arrived. A herd of fuckin' ugly reptilians are rushing from the outer space. Crime rate skyrocketed! United States of America is ruined! Wipe out all 12 billion of the green scum!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 -compatible graphics card with 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
